Articles.Content: my gmod is broken, so to me they do not exist. my hill

I weed all the florans and place a bunch of High Energy Pellets everywhere, and Build a fortress surrounded by Discouragement Beams

My Aperture fortress

> RELOADING: limitations for megatiger78...

> Reloading complete.

> LOADING: Watch\_Dogs.dll...

> Loading complete.

Then I hack your pacemaker. No one's hill with a corpse.

BTW Florans in *Starbound* are humanoids with plant characteristics.

I use acidic spray to defeat your eyes. You can no longer hack.

My hill.

I draw a handgun and shoot you.

My hill.

I draw a bigger gun and shoot you.

My hill.

I call upon the GDI ion cannon once again and blast the hill.

C&C3 ion cannon nukes everything.

My hill with a crater in it.

I use a magnetic forcefield. The ions get forced away.

My hill.

You had a crater. I build a hill.

My hill.

I purchase a truck from the nothing. I proceed to dig up my crater and put it on your hill.

My hill.

I buy a bulldozer and move the hill back to where I was standing.

My hill.

I explode your bulldozer. (Watch\_Dogs.dll still stands.)

No one's hill.
I beam down onto the hill from my ship's cloning machine. my hill.

I put an Ion bomb in your clonebay, and proceed to kill you. I then plant my flag on the hill.

My hill.

I take a sample of megatiger and make thousands of floran soldiers, clones of megatiger. They all swarm over the hill.

My hill. (of floran bodies)
I call down my army of Hierarchy Walkers (From Universe at War) to totally flatten your clones. And then make billions of Hierarchy units to swarm all over the hill.

I nuke the site repeatedly.

My crater.

I create another hill on top of your crater.

My hill.

I plant my flag on your hill.

My hill.

I drop a phosphorous bomb on the hill. Everything on the hill is annihilated.

My charred pile of dirt.

(#2345 woot)

I mix several hundred tons of compost in the dirt on the hill. A farmer decides to farm there. 

My farm.
the florans grow in the dirt. the agarans grow on the other side. a nuke hits you. my irradiated mass floran/agaran graveyard on a farm.

I plant my flag on your irradiated mass floran/agaran graveyard on a farm.

My irradiated mass floran/agaran graveyard on a farm.

I pour concrete on top of the hill, then build a lead bunker on top of it.

My hilltop radiation shelter.

I plant my flag on your hilltop radiation shelter.

My hilltop radiation shelter.
